item.title: RSE Asia signs its first MoU with Asia Pacific Advanced Network (APAN)
item.description:
RSE Asia signs its first MoU with Asia Pacific Advanced Network (APAN) to promote Research Software Engineering (RSE) in the Asia-Pacific region.

RSE Asia is proud to announce the signing of its first Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the Asia Pacific Advanced Network (APAN). This partnership marks a significant milestone in our mission to promote and support Research Software Engineering (RSE) across the Asia-Pacific region.

item.title: OLS team plants a tree dedicated to its cohort-4 in the OLS forest
item.description:
RSE Asia was launched as a project in the cohort-4 of the OLS.

The Open Life Science (OLS) team planted a tree dedicated to its cohort-4 in the OLS forest. RSE Asia was launched as a project in the cohort-4 of the OLS programme.

item.title: RSE Asia featured in the Collaborations Workshop 2022 highlights
item.description:
Proud moment for the RSE Asia community on getting featured in the Collaborations Workshop 2022 highlights.

RSE Asia got featured in the Collaborations Workshop 2022 highlights blogpost by the Software Sustainability Institute.
